title: Oh Holy Night
lyrics:
Oh holy night
The stars are brightly shining
It is the night
Of our dear Savior's birth
Long lay the world
In sin and error pining

'Till He appeared and the soul felt its worth

A thrill of hope

The weary world rejoices

For yonder breaks

A new and glorious morning

Fall on your knees

Oh hear the angels' voices

Oh night divine

Oh night when Christ was born

Oh holy night (Holy night)

The stars are brightly shining

It is the night

Of our dear Savior's birth (Ooh-ooh-ooh)

Long lay the world (Lay the world)

In sin and error pining

'Till He appeared and the soul felt its worth

A thrill of hope

The weary world rejoices

For yonder breaks

A new and glorious morn

Fall on your knees

Oh hear the angels' voices

Oh night divine

Oh night when Christ was born

Oh night (Oh night)

Divine (Divine)

Oh night when Christ was born

Oh night (Oh night)

Divine (Divine)

Oh night when Christ was born
